headline: AI In Media & Entertainment Market Report 2025-2033, Competitive Analysis of MathWorks, AWS, EMG, Gearhouse South Africa, Gravity Media, GrayMeta, IBM, LMG, Matchroom Sport, Production Resource Group
summary: The global AI in media and entertainment market is set to surge from $26.34 billion in 2024 to $166.77 billion by 2033, growing at a 22.76% CAGR. This growth is powered by rising demand for personalized content, automation in video editing, and real-time analytics. AI enhances content creation, distribution, and user engagement through technologies like machine learning and NLP. North America, Europe, and Asia-Pacific lead the adoption wave. Challenges include ethical concerns and data privacy.

headline: IBM Commits to Invest 20,000 Hours, an Expected Investment Value of $5,000,000, of Solution Architects and AI Engineers to Advance Datavault AI’s Partnership

(Nasdaq: DVLT), leading the way in AI data experience, valuation, and monetization, today announced that IBM (NYSE: IBM) has made a multi-million dollar commitment of resources.
